Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.storage

Interface DSEStorage

All Superinterfaces:
DatabaseAPI
All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLiteDataSpecStorage
public interface DSEStorage
extends DatabaseAPI
The interface supported by the DSE part of the storage system.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  DSEStorage.CoreToLoad
    A core with a data specification to load.
    static class  DSEStorage.Ethernet
    A ethernet which allows data specifications to be loaded.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int countWorkRequired()
    See how many DSE loading actions have to be done.
    int getSizeForCore​(DSEStorage.CoreToLoad coreToLoad)
    Get a size for a given core on a given ethernet chip.
    java.util.List<DSEStorage.CoreToLoad> listCoresToLoad​(DSEStorage.Ethernet ethernet)
    Get a list of all DSE loading actions that need to be done for a particular ethernet.
    java.util.List<DSEStorage.CoreToLoad> listCoresToLoad​(DSEStorage.Ethernet ethernet, boolean loadSystemCores)
    Get a list of all DSE loading actions that need to be done for a particular ethernet.
    java.util.List<DSEStorage.Ethernet> listEthernetsToLoad()
    Get a list of all ethernets that need to have DSE loading done on them.
    void saveLoadingMetadata​(DSEStorage.CoreToLoad coreToLoad, int startAddress, int memoryUsed, int memoryWritten)
    Record the results of loading a core.

  • Method Details

    • countWorkRequired

      int countWorkRequired() throws StorageException
      See how many DSE loading actions have to be done.
      Returns:
      The number of data specifications remaining to be executed.
      Throws:
      StorageException - If the database access fails.

    • getSizeForCore

      int getSizeForCore​(DSEStorage.CoreToLoad coreToLoad)
      Get a size for a given core on a given ethernet chip.
      Parameters:
      coreToLoad - The instruction to load a particular core.
      Returns:
      The size required for the DSE for this given core.

    • listEthernetsToLoad

      java.util.List<DSEStorage.Ethernet> listEthernetsToLoad() throws StorageException
      Get a list of all ethernets that need to have DSE loading done on them.
      Returns:
      The list of ethernets.
      Throws:
      StorageException - If the database access fails.

    • listCoresToLoad

      java.util.List<DSEStorage.CoreToLoad> listCoresToLoad​(DSEStorage.Ethernet ethernet) throws StorageException
      Get a list of all DSE loading actions that need to be done for a particular ethernet.
      Parameters:
      ethernet - The ethernet we're loading onto.
      Returns:
      The list of actions.
      Throws:
      StorageException - If the database access fails.

    • listCoresToLoad

      java.util.List<DSEStorage.CoreToLoad> listCoresToLoad​(DSEStorage.Ethernet ethernet, boolean loadSystemCores) throws StorageException
      Get a list of all DSE loading actions that need to be done for a particular ethernet.
      Parameters:
      ethernet - The ethernet we're loading onto.
      loadSystemCores - If true, just list system cores. If false, just list application (non-system) cores.
      Returns:
      The list of actions.
      Throws:
      StorageException - If the database access fails.

    • saveLoadingMetadata

      void saveLoadingMetadata​(DSEStorage.CoreToLoad coreToLoad, int startAddress, int memoryUsed, int memoryWritten) throws StorageException
      Record the results of loading a core.
      Parameters:
      coreToLoad - The instruction to load a particular core.
      startAddress - Where the load metadata starts.
      memoryUsed - How much memory was allocated by loading.
      memoryWritten - How much memory was written by loading.
      Throws:
      StorageException - If the database access fails.
